thread.title: DSP pays tribute to Mandolin Srinivas
thread.title_full: DSP pays tribute to Mandolin Srinivas - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: DSP pays tribute to Mandolin Srinivas
text: It is a well known fact that music sensation Devi Sri Prsasad considers legendary composer Mandolin Shrinivas as his guru, and now the ace composer has shared a picture of him standing next to a picture of the late composer in his office. He shared the picture on twitter and captioned it saying "Its been 1 year since my GURU Mandolin Shrinivas Anna joined the GODS!! But hes always with Us Blessing n Guiding Us" (sic)..
